title: Ultimate Ambient Music Bundle: Volume. 1
description: The Ultimate Ambient Music Bundle Vol 1 is the greatest collection of ambient soundtracks on Unity including Forests, Deserts, Oceans, Alien Worlds & Frozen Tundra's plus many, many more
longDescription:
The Ultimate Ambient Music Bundle Vol 1 is the greatest collection of ambient soundtracks on the Unreal Marketplace which includes an impressive 150 ambient soundtracks. Conveniently split into folders such as Forests, Deserts, Oceans, Alien Worlds & Frozen Tundra's plus many, many more


This bundle is essential for any genre, All tracks are 3 minutes long and easily dropped into your game to immediately set the perfect atmosphere in your next game with 7 and a half hours of beautiful ambient music


This bundle contains 14 packs with an RRP of $14.99 each so save a lot of money by purchasing the ultimate ambience bundle


Includes the following asset packs:


https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ambient-video-game-music-alien-worlds

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ambient-video-game-music-ancient-ruins

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ambient-video-game-music-china

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ambient-video-game-music-deserts

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ambient-video-game-music-caves

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ambient-video-game-music-marshlands

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ambient-video-game-music-japan

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ambient-video-game-music-oceans

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ambient-music-science-fiction

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ambient-video-game-music-forests

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ambient-video-game-music-frozen-tundra

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ambient-video-game-music-beaches


Also Includes:


Ambience - Mountains

Ambience - Nature

Ambience - Underwater
